comment:
* A wrapper around ICellBroadcastService that forwards calls to implementations of
     * {@link CellBroadcastService}.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public void handleGsmCellBroadcastSms(int slotIndex, byte[] message)
methods.comment:
* Handle a GSM cell broadcast SMS.
         *
         * @param slotIndex the index of the slot which received the broadcast
         * @param message   the SMS message PDU

methods.name: public void handleCdmaCellBroadcastSms(int slotIndex, byte[] bearerData, int serviceCategory)
methods.comment:
* Handle a CDMA cell broadcast SMS.
         *
         * @param slotIndex       the index of the slot which received the broadcast
         * @param bearerData      the CDMA SMS bearer data
         * @param serviceCategory the CDMA SCPT service category

methods.name: public void handleCdmaScpMessage(int slotIndex, List<CdmaSmsCbProgramData> smsCbProgramData, String originatingAddress, RemoteCallback callback)
methods.comment:
* Handle a CDMA Service Category Program message.
         *
         * @param slotIndex          the index of the slot which received the message
         * @param smsCbProgramData   the SMS CB program data of the message
         * @param originatingAddress the originating address of the message
         * @param callback           a callback to run after each cell broadcast receiver has
         *                           handled the SCP message

methods.name: public CharSequence getCellBroadcastAreaInfo(int slotIndex)
methods.comment:
* Get broadcasted area information
         *
         * @param slotIndex         the index of the slot which received the message
         *
         * @return The area information

methods.name: protected void dump(FileDescriptor fd, PrintWriter fout, String[] args)
public void dump(FileDescriptor fd, String[] args)

methodNames: public void handleGsmCellBroadcastSms(int slotIndex, byte[] message)
public void handleCdmaCellBroadcastSms(int slotIndex, byte[] bearerData, int serviceCategory)
public void handleCdmaScpMessage(int slotIndex, List<CdmaSmsCbProgramData> smsCbProgramData, String originatingAddress, RemoteCallback callback)
protected void dump(FileDescriptor fd, PrintWriter fout, String[] args)
public void dump(FileDescriptor fd, String[] args)
